info.author: Seantis GmbH
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Commisioned by `Onegov`_ as a way to have simple maps for municipalities to
show of scrap yards, barbecue pits and playgrounds.

This modules does not offer the ability to define placemarks, instead it gathers
them from different sources that offer KML documents.

Requirements
------------

-  Python 2.7
-  Plone 4.3+
-  Linux / Posix ( Windows may or may not work )

Build Status
------------

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/seantis/seantis.placemap.png   
  :target: https://travis-ci.org/seantis/seantis.placemap
  :alt: Build Status

------------

Changelog
---------

0.2 (2014-12-01)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 - Adds the ability to toggle markers by clicking on them. Fixes #2.
   [href]

 - Makes sure bogus urls don't lead to an exception. Fixes #3.
   [href]

 - Fixes KML before loading, to avoid common problems found in external
   KML sources.
   [href]

0.1 (2014-10-29)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 - Initial release.
   [href]
info.keywords: plone seantis map government municipality kml
info.name: seantis.placemap
info.summary: Shows placemarks from multiple maps in one map, by combining kml-documents from multiple urls.
info.html_description:
Commisioned by Onegov as a way to have simple maps for municipalities to show of scrap yards, barbecue pits and playgrounds.

This modules does not offer the ability to define placemarks, instead it gathers them from different sources that offer KML documents.

Requirements

  • Python 2.7
  • Plone 4.3+
  • Linux / Posix ( Windows may or may not work )
